skill.name: behaviors.skills.Damage
skill.description:
For the agent, to damage a set of issued works.
This skill uses the "deconstruct" skill to models the damage of a riot or a loot. The agent deconstruct each element (see the "deconstruct" skill description) during a limited time. The delay of partial deconstruction depends on the delay of the agent installation (see authoring tool in "stances" section, "time to activate" ). Each time the agent is 100% installed on its decontruction position, it visits the next target.
The skill ends when all elements have been visited.

parameter.name: works
parameter.description: The works to damage (object or urban blocks).

link.name: deconstruct
link.description: To enact the decision of damaging the issued elements.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent once all elements have been visited.
